name: OCO
description:
Immerse yourself in the minimalist audio-visual platforming world of OCO

Use simple one-button controls to launch, rush, crash, glide, warp, and hang as you solve 180 hand-crafted platforming puzzles

Create and share your own designs using the built-in editor and explore thousands of user-generated levels online

Hone your skills and reach the top of the global online leaderboards

FEATURES


• Precision platforming
• Simple one-button controls
• Complex challenging puzzles
• 75,000+ user-generated levels
• Procedurally-generated soundtrack for every level
• Built-in editor (create levels and challenge friends to complete them!)
• Cross-platform multiplayer
• 180 unique levels
• Beautiful minimalist design
• Online community
• Online leaderboards
• Weekly competitive events
• Cross-platform cloud save
• Daily challenges
• ‘Perfect solution’ challenges for all levels
• 60 achievements
• Reactions

AWARDS


Finalist Pocket Gamer People’s Choice Award, 2020
Finalist Google Play Indie Games Showcase 2019
Finalist Big Indie Pitch, Develop, Brighton, 2018
